channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Signpost damage in accident, 10th July
item.description:
West side of A435 at Oxenton turn. Sign damaged in accident and now only supported on one post. Other post in ditch. Sign could rotate in wind and impede traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Oxenton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)
